original_text: For the time will come when people will not put up with sound doctrine. Instead, to suit their own desires, they will gather around them a great number of teachers to say what their itching ears want to hear.
korean_text: 때가 이르리니 사람이 바른 교훈을 받지 아니하며 귀가 가려워서 자기의 사욕을 따를 스승을 많이 두고

sentences.original_text: when people will not put up with sound doctrine
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 건전한 교훈을 견디지 않을 때가

sentences.original_text: Instead, to suit their own desires
they will gather around them a great number of teachers
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자기 주위에 많은 교사들을 모을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: to say what their itching ears want to hear
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 가려운 귀가 듣고 싶어 하는 것을 말하기 위해
